description:
Unity's C# stateless physics library.

Built on top of the Unity C# DOTS framework, Unity Physics is network-ready, completely customizable, and built for performance out of the box. Whether you're building the next mobile hit or a new networked multiplayer console experience, Unity Physics leverages the Burst compiler and Job system to scale across a range of hardware.
name: com.unity.physics

samples.description: Provides a custom authoring experience for creating rigid bodies and colliders for Unity Physics.

_upm.changelog:
### Added

* Added support for overriding mass properties when baking `Rigidbody` authoring components. Now, when setting the `RigidBody.automaticCenterOfMass` or `RigidBody.automaticInertiaTensor` properties to false, the corresponding mass property data values are correctly baked into the Unity Physics rigid body entity and appear as expected in the entity's `PhysicsMass` component.

### Changed

* Updated Burst dependency to version 1.8.7
